        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   There are two applications included on this CD:                    |
        |                                                                      |
        |    !EFFcat - an electronic catalogue of the high quality fonts       |
        |              from the Electronic Font Foundry                        |
        |     - it shows samples of most of the EFF fonts                      |
        |     - it has a search facility to search all the EFF names as well   |
        |       as their PostScriptÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â© equivalents                               |
        |     - the fonts are grouped into categories: Latin, Cyrillic,        |
        |       Greek, etc.                                                    |
        |                                                                      |
        |    !PDcat - an electronic catalogue of the free Public Domain fonts  |
        |             from the Electronic Font Foundry:                        |
        |     - it shows samples of the PD fonts                               |
        |     - it installs PD fonts on your system                            |
        |     - it has a search facility to search all font names              |
        |                                                                      |
